archimate:WorkPackage.name: HCM
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation:
May 2018: Ongoing project --- Helicopter Configuration Management --- HCM Phase 2 WP4 EPP ILS H175 & SCDM integration project
WP1: Impact Analysis & IPC DMRL WP2: Integrate ATBB as key input from Design Office WP3: Trigger management WP4: Manage Certification / Airworthiness data --- Project synthesis To deploy a new Standard defining trans‐function Configuration activities all along H/C Contract Execution SCOPE : COMMERCIAL PROGRAMS Program <--> Design <--> Conf <-->Airworthiness <--> Indus <-->Tech data
